name: SpinIn.io
description:
*** The MOST WANTED Fidget Spinner game is now LIVE directly from your phone ***

* Fascinated NEON style
* UNIQUE effect for each type of spinner
* MESMERIZED visualization on different RPM
* UP to 20 DIVERGENT fidget spinner and 160 effects
* Real-time ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
* And MORE to come!

VARIOUS modes with STRATEGIC gameplay:

* Be the FASTEST: Grow faster as you collect more points. EARN coins by destroying other spinners.
* Be the GREATEST HUNTER: EXTERMINATE all spinners!
* Be the CAPTAIN: Lead your team to GLORY. Eliminate all enemy teams.

********* JOIN to feel the PHENOMENON special effects and MOST INTENSE battles you will ever seen.
